name: AI Sorting Hat
shortDescription: Draw animals and get sorted into your Hogwarts house.  This is the code powering http://aisortinghat.com/ Powered by TensorFlow.js this site uses drawings by Google's Quick, Draw! datacet to identify your drawings. Draw a Lion, Raven, Badger, or Serpent, but don't draw a skull ;)
longDescription: Draw animals and get sorted into your Hogwarts house.  This is the code powering http://aisortinghat.com/ Powered by TensorFlow.js this site uses drawings by Google's Quick, Draw! datacet to identify your drawings. Draw a Lion, Raven, Badger, or Serpent, but don't draw a skull ;)
